greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 1, read by antidiagonals: A(n,k) = exp(1/k) * Sum_{j>=0} (k*j + 1)^n / ((-k)^j * j!).
formula: G.f. of column k: (1/(1 - x)) * Sum_{j>=0} (-x/(1 - x))^j / Product_{i=1..j} (1 - k*i*x/(1 - x)).
E.g.f. of column k: exp(x + (1 - exp(k*x)) / k).
mathematica: Table[Function[k, SeriesCoefficient[1/(1 - x) Sum[(-x/(1 - x))^j/Product[(1 - k i x/(1 - x)), {i, 1, j}], {j, 0, n}], {x, 0, n}]][m - n + 1], {m, 0, 10}, {n, 0, m}] // Flatten
Table[Function[k, n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[x + (1 - Exp[k x])/k], {x, 0, n}]][m - n + 1], {m, 0, 10}, {n, 0, m}] // Flatten
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 18 2020
